name: Nature s Secrets Anti Wrinkle Night Cream
description: Rich in retinol, vitamin A in its purest form, and ultra-nourishing sweet almond oil, this beauty cream helps rejuvenate skin and reduce the effects of skin aging for a more youthful and healthy complexion. Further enriched with virgin coconut oil and olive oil, this mineral-oil free cream effectively hydrates and nourishes skin for beautiful radiance. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
